items.title: Crime, migration and the specter of Tren de Aragua steer Chile’s election
items.summary: COLCHANE, Chile (Reuters) -Chileans are heading into Sunday's presidential election consumed by fear over crime, immigration and organized gangs that have taken root in a few short years, a far cry from the wave of left-wing optimism and hopes of drafting a new constitution that dominated the last election cycle. Read full story

items.title: Ninja’s Crispi 5-in-1 portable air fryer comes with various glassware, plates, and lids at a new $159 Amazon low
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Ninja Crispi 5-in-1 Portable Glass Air Fryer for $159 shipped in a green colorway, while the other colors on the same page bring 4-in-1 functionality for $1 higher. This newer model has only been on the Amazon marketplace for two months and normally runs $220 outside of discounts, of which we’ve seen the costs taken as low as $185 here, with Costco having had a one-time, short-lived cut to $125 with a membership back at the top of the month. Aside from that rate, you’re otherwise looking at the best price we have tracked and a new low price at Amazon, giving you $61 in savings while also upgrading your air frying game – especially with holiday feasts on the horizon.

more…

items.title: I’ve been using these Matter-certified Linkind smart bulbs for over a year, grab four at just $6 each
items.summary:
Linkind Matter RGBTW Light Bulbs (4-pack)

Buy for $24.50 (Reg. $30)

What we love
